name: Five Steps Process
description: The 5-Step Process By Ray Dalio to get what you want out of life.

title.en: Think about what you want out of life and make your work a path to getting it.

q.en: How do each path you took fits your goal?

name.fr: Identifier et tolère pas les problèmes

name.en: Diagnose the root causes of problems
name.fr: Diagnostiquer la causes principales des problèmes

_tbd: Remember that weaknesses don't matter if you find solutions
Understand your own and others' mental maps and humility
